contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Faimes |picture= |picture-legend= |map=Faimes Liège Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Faimes in the province of Liège |arms= |flag= |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LG}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Waremme|Waremme]] |nis=64076 |pyramid-date |0-19= |20-64 |65 |foreigners= |foreigners-date |mayor=Marie-Alice Corswarem-Vandereyken (EDF) |majority= EDF |postal-codes=4317 |telephone-area=019 |web=[http://www.faimes.be/ www.faimes.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=40 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=16 }} '''Faimes''' is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Liège (province)|Liège]]. On January 1, 2006 Faimes had a total population of 3,468. The total area is {{convert|28.48|km²|2|abbr=on}} which gives a [[population density]] of 122 inhabitants per km². == Gallery == <gallery> File:Les Waleffes CH1JPG.jpg|'''Les Waleffes''', the castle (18th century) File:Les Waleffes Fe1cJPG.jpg|'''Les Waleffes''', the Saint-Pierre farm (1644) Image:Viemme, kerk foto4 2011-09-25 15.22.JPG|'''Viemme''', church </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} {{Liege municipalities}} [[Category:Municipalities of Liège (province)]] {{Liege-geo-stub}}
